name: Support Genix – Support Tickets Managing System & Helpdesk Plugin for WordPress and WooCommerce
author: Support Genix

sections.description:
Support Genix is a support ticket system, Support Tickets Managing System, Customer Support Ticketing, Support Ticket management, and Helpdesk Plugin for a WordPress site. Users may now create tickets and get help right from your WordPress site.

Support Genix is a WordPress Support Ticket Plugin that allows users to create tickets and get help right from your WordPress site. The WordPress helpdesk plugin adds the features of a comprehensive support ticket system to your WordPress site. Support Genix is easy to use and install. It is also available in a free and premium version. Support Genix is a great way to get help from your WordPress site.

Alternative to: Freshdesk support Ticket system, Zendesk support, Helpscout, Clickdesk, Awesome Support, Fluent Support.

Purchase Support Genix Pro – WordPress Ticketing System

Video Tutorial

Watch this video tutorial and learn how about Helpdesk setup, ticketing software, or helpdesk software setup for your WordPress website.

Support Genix Lite Features

Unlimited Tickets: Manage as many tickets as you need, there are no limitations on the number of tickets.

Unlimited Agents: Add as many agents as you need to help manage your tickets.

Unlimited Customers: There is no limit on the number of customers.

Custom Ticket Fields: Customize the fields of your tickets to get the information you need.

Agent Roles: Assign different roles to your agents to give them different permissions.

Ticket Categories: Create different ticket categories to organize your tickets.

File Attachments: Allow customers to attach files to their tickets. You can define the type of allowed files.

Filters and Sorting: Use the filters and sorting options to manage your tickets.

Email Notifications: Receive/Send email notifications when a new ticket is created or updated. You can customize email templates for Admin/Agent and customers.

Ticket Status: Change the status of tickets to keep track of them. Available statuses are – New, In Progress, Re-Open, and Active.

Ticket Notes: Add notes to tickets for internal use.

Tickets on Behalf of Users: Agents can create tickets on behalf of users.

Transfer Ticket: Agents can transfer tickets to other agents.

Close Ticket: Close tickets when they are no longer needed.

Re-Open Tickets: Re-open closed tickets if needed.

Ticket Logs: View the history of a ticket to see who made changes and when.

Envato Integrations: Support Genix integrates with popular marketplace like Envato marketplace / ThemeForest / CodeCanyon to verify purchase code.

Saved Replies / Canned Responses: Save replies to use them later. This is helpful when you need to give the same reply to multiple tickets.

Recaptcha: Add Google reCAPTCHA to your ticket form to prevent spam.

Fully Responsive: The plugin is fully responsive and looks great on all devices.

Search: Use the search feature to find tickets quickly and easily.

No. of replies: You can see the total number of replies in a ticket.

Need Reply Ticket Labels: To quickly identify which tickets need a reply.

Order by: Choose how you want to order your tickets – by date, status, etc.

Responsive Design: This WordPress ticket plugin is fully responsive and looks great on all devices.

Translation Ready: This WordPress Support plugin is translation ready and can be translated into any language.

WPML Compatible: This WordPress ticketing plugin is fully compatible with WPML, allowing you to use it in multiple languages.

Submit Ticket Form: The WordPress support ticket plugin includes a ticket form that customers can use to submit tickets or create support tickets.

Ticket List: This customer service plugin includes a ticket list where you can see all the tickets.

Agent Ticket List: This ticket systems plugin includes an agent ticket list where agents can see all the tickets they are assigned to.

Customer Ticket List: This WordPress helpdesk ticket plugin includes a customer ticket list where customers can see all the tickets they have submitted.

Ticket Details: This help desk plugin includes a ticket details page where you can see all the information about a ticket.

🎊Support Genix is a Simple support ticket system for WordPress

If you run a website, then you’re likely to encounter support requests at some point. A support ticket system or support portal is a great way to manage and organize these requests. It allows you to easily keep track of all the tickets, and it makes it easy for customers to submit tickets. Support Genix help desk for WordPress is a great option for managing tickets. It’s easy to use and it has all the features you need to manage your tickets.

Plus, it’s free!

Support Genix Helpdesk Solution’s Premium Features

The premium version of the plugin includes additional features like Webhook Integration, Email Piping, and more.

Webhook Integration: The plugin can be integrated with popular services like Slack, HubSpot, MailChimp, and more using webhooks. Webhook can send data for a selected event like On Ticket creation or reply.

Email Piping: The plugin can be integrated with your email server using IMAP to allow customers to reply to tickets via email. Create an unlimited WordPress mailbox using this pro feature.

Priority Support: Get priority support from our team of experts.

Purchase Support Genix Pro
sections.installation:
1. Install that plugin into your WordPress application

  2. Then active the plugin

  3. You will get a menu of Support Genix
sections.faq:
How many tickets I can manage?

There is no limitation. You can manage unlimited tickets.

Is it GDPR compliant?

Yes. All of the data will be managed in WordPress, and the user can remove personal information from the account at any time.

Will there be any performance issues for WordPress?

Not at all! We were cautious about it from the start. We developed the plugin with VueJS.

Version: 1.2.7 – Date: 15 April, 2024

  • Fixed: Issue with frontend synchronization upon logging out.
  • Fixed: Few minor issues.

  • Added: Functionality for ticket search by custom field.
  • Fixed: Few minor issues.

Version: 1.2.4 – Date: 14 March, 2024

  • Enhanced: Strengthened access permissions and nonce verifications for enhanced security.
  • Tested: Ensured compatibility with the latest WordPress version.

Version: 1.2.3 – Date: 08 March, 2024

  • Enhanced: Strengthened security measures across the plugin for improved protection.
  • Enhanced: Implemented file upload security enhancements, enabling the selection of specific file types for ticket and reply uploads.
  • Fixed: Addressed several minor issues for smoother operation.
  • Tested: Ensured compatibility with the latest WordPress version.

Version: 1.2.2 – Date: 25 February, 2024

  • Removed: Translation files for Arabic and Hebrew languages.
  • Fixed: Multiple text domain issues.

  • Added: Field for custom field slug.

Version: 1.1.0 – Date: 27 December, 2022

  • Updated: All admin forms default status.
  • Updated: Email template group title.
  • Fixed: Automatic ticket assign role issues.
  • Improved: Few minor things.
  • Fixed: Few minor issues.

Version: 1.0.9 – Date: 15 December, 2022

Version: 1.0.3 – Date: 06 October, 2022

sections.reviews:
Super extension

By myroqya on March 25, 2024

Très belle extension, agréable et facile à manipuler, idéal pour gérer la communication avec les clients et le sav, elle est super design et meilleur que les extension que j'avais essayé, le prix est correct. Je recommande sans problème.

Yassine

Super Impressed!

By vivies (Sinou2014) on December 12, 2023

I feel lucky to have run into Support Genix. It’s elegant, and super easy to set up and customize. I really like the user interface. Very nice documentation and FAQs, too. Found answers so easily. I also like the 1 flat fee for a lifetime. It doesn't get any better than that. We are still checking it out to see if it'll meet our needs, but it's promising, and their team appears committed to evolving it.

Very good quality support plugin

By pieter (Pieter) on April 11, 2023

After trying out other support ticket plugins we ended up with this and we are very content. Works like a charm and is simple and accurate.
Why are there so little users? Try this folks. Even the free version is quite usable. Pro version is affordable.
Compare with others!
Congrats!
PS: I am not related to the devs.

I would recommend it to everyone.

By exgeer on November 23, 2022

It's a really good app, I recommend it to everyone. I would be very happy if Turkish language support is provided.

Feature packed and very affordable ticket system

By bradmillar on July 5, 2022

I am very grateful to the team developing Support Genix. Competing plugins or services are incredibly expensive with some requiring an exorbitant payment per user which becomes out of reach for smaller businesses or entrepreneurs trying to make a start. With Support Genix I have unlimited users, the ability to categorise tickets, email pipe tickets from users to the system, search within tickets, receive ticket notifications, assign users to a ticket and all tickets are logged and time stamped. These are just some of the features they deliver, with more value adds on the way with user feedback, I am sure. All in all, very impressed with the professionalism and eagerness of the team to help with any technical queries or feature requests. Highly recommend this plugin to Wordpress developers or basic users and to really consider the extra value adds of the super affordable pro version of this plugin.
